channel.title: Keeping an account logged in for 2 days with scar?
channel.description: will the account on runscape stay logged in if i have a simple autoclicker click on the runscape site for 2 days straight?

item.description:
@uncfan1119 wrote:

But if you auto click (clicking the same coords ) then you’d get picked up within the hour and kicked from the fagx server?

item.title: Keeping an account logged in for 2 days with scar?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

So the pin number can delete itself and poopy can take all the stuff, and of course jagex would know if a person hasn’t logged out in 48 hours, and so will track every trade and if the trade seems unfair in any way, then poopies account will be banned. And if poopy trades it to a noob account and then to his main, both accounts will be banned.

Pin numbers aren’t deleted until 3 days have gone by. So I guess 1 day was already chewed up, this is the only logical explanation i can think of lol.

Read full topic
